data.name: ARK-ADE Demo
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever dreamt about being inside an old Arcade Machine?

Inspired by the major 80’s Pop Culture references like Metal Slug and Blade Runner, ARK-ADE harmonizes the old fast-paced Run ‘n’ Gun games with the new era of VR technology, diving you into an iconic setting to strafe enemies, protect ARK and defeat ADE.

FEATURES


  • Choose between Free Locomotion and Teleport Movement to enjoy the game without the risk of motion sickness
  • Protect ARK from ADE’s army
  • Morphing weapon
  • Enjoy destructible environment and covers
  • Collect all the secrets and defeat ADE. for good
  • Immerse into the nostalgic 80’s Low-poly Sci-Fi setting
  • Shoot to the beat of our original soundtrack

data.short_description: Have you ever dreamt about being inside an old Arcade Machine? ARK-ADE is a fast-paced VR First Person Shooter. Plunge into the retro vibes and shoot your way out through an evocative low-poly 80’s Sci-Fi setting to protect ARK and defeat ADE.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: i3 7th gen or AMD Ryzen
  • Graphics: 90fps on Vive -> GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • DirectX: Version 12
